title: Let's make Poppy great again.
body: I love playing Poppy. A simple character - Smash, Shield, Charge, Super Smash. I'd love to see her bumped up a tier or two. If you like a simple w, e, q, r kill from out of the blue support newbies for Poppy power cause us newbies need a kill too.

replies.body:
Um, Poppy is already dealing a decent amount of damage without any attack items...

I love Poppy the way she is now, it would ruin everything if they changed her again.
I'd love if rito can bring back old poppy. Old poppy was my favourite champ. :')
poppys suppose to be a tank though you can build her full damaged,
Type "Poppy" if you support a Tier Lift. Let Poppy hit a little harder.
